titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 82) to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the Government pension offset and windfall elimination provisions.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 82) to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the Government pension offset and windfall elimination provisions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Graves (LA). Petition No: 118-16.
Motion to discharge the Committee on Rules filed by Mr. Graves (LA). Assigned to the Discharge Calendar, Calendar No. 2.
UNANIMOUS CONSENT REQUEST - Mr. Luttrell asked unanimous consent that H. Res. 1410 be laid on the table. Agreed to without objection.
